title: English A1 eBook
author: Your Name
description: An interactive eBook for teaching English at level A1, focusing on letters, numbers, colors, words, and simple sentences.

lessons.title: Introduction to Letters, Numbers, and Colors
lessons.description: This lesson introduces the basic letters of the alphabet, numbers, and colors.

lessons.title: Words and Vocabulary
lessons.description: This lesson teaches common English words including verbs, nouns, and adjectives.

lessons.title: Simple Sentences
lessons.description: This lesson teaches common English sentences with Bahasa Indonesia translations.
